posts.author: Benedict Cumberbatch
posts.title: 8.2M Could Have Lower Mortgage Payments
posts.text: The average borrower stands to save about $266 per month on their mortgage by refinancing.

posts.author: Dawid Pemberton
posts.title: 4 Maintenance Chores Your Clients Shouldn’t Delay
posts.text: Homeowners who fail to perform these upkeep tasks in a timely manner may face hefty repair bills in the future.

posts.author: Norah Greene
posts.title: 2 Billion Records Exposed in Smart-Home Device Breach
posts.text: Just how secure is that “smart” security camera or door lock? That is being called into question.

posts.author: Haider Mackie
posts.title: Mystery Solved: The Best Way to Vacuum a Room
posts.text: A quick pass with a vacuum cleaner is sometimes fine, but go deep with these techniques for the best cleaning.

posts.author: Tamar Greer
posts.title: Suburbs Are Cool Again, and Younger Generations Swoop In
posts.text: Many U.S. suburbs are seeing their populations grow as millennials move out of the city and head to the ’burbs.

posts.author: Cain Vargas
posts.title: This Housing Trend May Radically Change Neighborhoods
posts.text: Oregon is the latest to loosen single-family zoning laws to pave the way for more homebuilding. Critics argue these laws are destroying neighborhoods.

posts.author: Alisha Little
posts.title: Builders Will Build It, If You Rent It
posts.text: The build-to-rent market is exploding in growth.

posts.author: Edith Jennings
posts.title: Statewide PSA Warns Real Estate Scams Put You at Risk
posts.text: The growing threat of wire fraud in housing transactions is prompting the Utah Division of Real Estate to warn the public.
